knimeNode.name: Enumerate BN
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates a table with all the combinations of values and the corresponding probabilities

fullDescription.intro:
Using a Bayesian network which describes densities of probabilities, this node generates a data table with columns corresponding the variables of the BN, and the content of cells being the categories of the variables.
Go there to report bugs or ask for features
fullDescription.option: when a combination of values leads to 0, do not create the line (default)

ports.outPort: Combinations generated from the Bayesian network
